summary: The Veteran Caregiver Reeducation, Reemployment, and Retirement Act focuses on expanding benefits and support for family caregivers of veterans. It extends medical care coverage for caregivers, provides employment assistance including reimbursement for certifications, access to training, and access to assistance programs. The bill also expands available services, mandates studies on returnship programs, hiring former caregivers by the VA, and establishing retirement plans for caregivers. Finally, it calls for reports on caregiver support and feasibility of retirement savings options.
